title: Don't Worry Darling Mega Review
content: Ali and friend of the show Clarrise Loughrey chat in depth about Don't Worry Darling, one of the most talked about movies before it was even released. Warning: The latter part of this podcast contains spoilers, so why not pop down to your local cinema and see the movie before listening.
contentSnippet:
Ali and friend of the show Clarrise Loughrey chat in depth about Don't Worry Darling, one of the most talked about movies before it was even released.
Warning: The latter part of this podcast contains spoilers, so why not pop down to your local cinema and see the movie before listening.

itunes.author: BBC Radio 1
itunes.subtitle: Ali and Clarrise Loughrey chat in spoileriffic detail about Don't Worry Darling.
